participant_1.background:
My favorite people are the ones who support me and encourage me to be the best version of myself.
I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions.
i run marathons.
I hope I can use my martial arts skills to protect myself and others.
i have three beautiful dogs and one cat.

participant_2.background:
I am a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies.
I'm proud of my daughter and mom!
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.
my friend once bought me a car.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well! I'm excited to go on a bike ride with some tunes in my ears. What about you?
I'm good! I'm just hanging out at home with my dogs and cat.
That sounds nice! I love animals, I have a dog and a cat too.
Oh nice! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a black lab. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a pit bull.
Oh nice! I love both of those breeds.
Me too! They're both so sweet and loving.
I agree!
What kind of music do you like to listen to on your bike rides?
I like to listen to a lot of different genres of music, but I usually listen to rock music when I'm biking.
Oh nice! I like to listen to rock music too.
Great! What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are The Black Keys, Foo Fighters, and The White Stripes.
Oh nice! I like all of those bands too!
Great! We should go on a bike ride together sometime and listen to some music.
That would be fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! We can exchange numbers and plan it out.
Sounds good
